Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show how two students communicate using a string telephone in the drawing.
The student can illustrate the problem of communicating over a long distance.
The student can demonstrate how sound travels through the string to communicate information.
The student can include specific features of the design, like the string and the cups or cans.
The student can show how the device uses sound to solve the communication problem.
The student can reflect how people use technology, like string telephones, to stay connected over long distances.
